concept.title: Additional Kafka Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom Kafka configuration properties to the Kafka Producer.

conbody.p: Kafka Producer destinationadditional propertiescustom propertiesKafka ProducerWhen you add the Kafka configuration property, enter the exact property name and the value. The Kafka Consumer does not validate the property names or values.
conbody.note: The Kafka Producer uses the broker.host Kafka configuration property. The Kafka Consumer ignores user-defined values for the broker.list property.
